import React from 'react' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import Box from '@mui/material/Box'; import Container from '@mui/material/Container'; import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography'; import { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../App'; import Button from '@mui/material/Button'; import AddIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Add'; import '../App.css' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Alert from '@mui/material/Alert'; import IconButton from '@mui/material/IconButton'; import Collapse from '@mui/material/Collapse'; import CloseIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Close'; //ver que pija pasa con la fuente que no anda si la pongo en App.css //ver display alert y next button export default function DragExercises() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [day, setDay] = useState(false) const {list, setList} = useContext(UserContext); const [nextClick, setNextClick] = useState(false) const [open, setOpen] = useState(true); const [greenExercises, setGreenExercises] = useState(true) const [exercisesLeft, setExercisesLeft] = useState(false) const handleClickDayButton = (event) => { if (day === event.currentTarget.id) { setDay(false) } else { setDay(event.currentTarget.id) } } const hadleClickGreenButton = (movement, index) => { if (day) { const newList = {...list}; newList[movement][index].day = day setList(newList) } else { return } } const handleNextClick = () => { setNextClick(true) console.log(nextClick) } return ( <> Select exercises {Object.keys(list).map(movement => {list[movement] .map((exercise, index) => exercise.isClicked && !exercise.day && )} )}
Monday
{Object.keys(list).map(movement => {list[movement] .map((exercise, index) => exercise.isClicked && exercise.day === 'monday' && )} )}
Tuesday

{Object.keys(list).map(movement => {list[movement] .map((exercise, index) => exercise.isClicked && exercise.day === 'wednesday' && )} )}
Thursday
{Object.keys(list).map(movement => {list[movement] .map((exercise, index) => exercise.isClicked && exercise.day === 'thursday' && )} )}
Friday
{Object.keys(list).map(movement => {list[movement] .map((exercise, index) => exercise.isClicked && exercise.day === 'friday' && )} )}
Saturday
{Object.keys(list).map(movement => {list[movement] .map((exercise, index) => exercise.isClicked && exercise.day === 'saturday' && )} )}
Sunday
{Object.keys(list).map(movement => {list[movement] .map((exercise, index) => exercise.isClicked && exercise.day === 'sunday' && )} )}
